PrecisAuthority to execute and issue an INSTRUMENT of FULL POWERS authorizing the Hon. Douglas Grinslade Lewis, P.C., M.P., or alternatively, Ambassador Derek H. Burney or Deputy Chief of Mission Marc Brault to sign an EXCHANGE OF NOTES with the Gov't of the United States of America which will amend the Agreement providing for the establishment, maintenance and operation of a Loran-C Transmitting Station at Williams Lake, British Columbia.
